title: Its been long enough............
body:
Alright, so we have an OCE server and a nice big community. So, wheres my Dominion?

I'm not asking for it permanently or even in a proper rotation, but you could at least have it as a featured game mode every now and then. I can't see why it can't be when there isn't anything else coming up for a bit (cough 'urf' cough). 

Come on, just for a week or 2, there are so many new people on the servers it'll be even games, its fun and it's even a core part of everyone's stats. Or if thats not possible, please explain the justification, or at least link me to a red post which does.

Thanks,

replies.body: wait people actually care about dominion?

> [{quoted}](name=Luscious Thighs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=F36sVFWs,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-26T20:56:17.746+0000)
>
> wait people actually care about dominion?

I used it for like five minute games before I left anywhere.
maybe it would fix those "gotta go in 20' guys..
maybe..
or they would still play rift like %%%%%es
Community still isn't that big. You can tell by the number of qq threads regarding normals matchmaking.

If we had enough people playing constantly we'd have Dominion.
But we don't.


So get out there and invite many more people to play, increase the server population by 100,000 at all times of the day.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=F36sVFWs,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-26T21:23:08.811+0000)
>
> If we had enough people playing constantly we'd have Dominion.
> But we don't.
> 
> 
> So get out there and invite many more people to play, increase the server population by 100,000 at all times of the day.

then get the reference perks of inviting people and make some awesome %%%% to put into the game

I agree!

Oceania should have Dominion as a featured game mode!
It shouldn't be too hard to implement seeing as it function on other servers.
The server can obvious handle special modes, we get them all the time!
So if no other special event is one, why not Dominion!
And after a year of not being able to play, and with it being limited I'm sure many players will give it ago while they can.

Please Riot give us Dominion as a featured mode.
Not sure why this was neg'd
